short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Lightspark demo that shows money streaming in real-time using the Lightning Network.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine a world where you can pay for individual articles, music tracks, or even Wi-Fi access by the minute, all without incurring exorbitant fees. 

This demo illustrates one of the many capabilities of Lightspark and the Lightning Network. This extension allows you to create a funded wallet and see funds instantly move from one wallet to another as the video streams.
